titles.title: To repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.
Responsible Path to Full Obamacare Repeal Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Education and Labor, Natural Resources, the Judiciary, House Administration, Rules, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committee.subcommittee: Indigenous Peoples of the United States
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Responsible Path to Full Obamacare Repeal Act
This bill repeals the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010, effective at the beginning of FY2020. Provisions of law amended by those Acts are restored.
